Quickstrike:





"Sure thing, sugar-bot." Quickstrike said to Black Arachnia as she 
left. He briefly quivered his metal strips at his cheeks at her, but 
he knew she didn't see. He watched her go, for a few moments, until 
she was out of sight. 

In was in command. Again. But this time it was under Black Arachnia's 
orders, where he was happy, not where they were bots staring at him 
like there was something wrong with him. 

He shook his head and walked off. He walked to the ramp and opened 
it. He looked around carefully, not fully exposing his whole body. He 
looked for Vemonus.
